entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Provide more information in error #55107
  • You broke Blazor with RenderMode #55104
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #55094

Closed

  • WasmBrowser and RCL projects fail based on alphabetic ordering of names #55105
    9.0-preview6
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #55095
  • Clannel.Reader.WaitToReadAsync() blocks subsequent requests to the action for 20 seconds #55099
  • Updating Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.DevServer to 8.0.4 causing issues #55075
  • Issue with Options having an array property that is added twice #55096
  • Perf regression: mvc #55074

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Update Wix version #55103
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Update Wix version #55101
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.5
  • [release/7.0] Update Wix version #55102
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.19
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.4.24207.7 #55011
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 9.0-preview4
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `0af9766` to `b1a777f` #55100
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4

Updated

  • Allow retries in DefaultKeyResolver.CanCreateAuthenticatedEncryptor #54711
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun
  • [Blazor] Use JSON source generator during WebAssembly startup #54956
    area-blazor
  • Change how ANCM recycles app #52807
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • Include a warning about port spoofing in xml #54971
    community-contribution, area-networking, area-routing
  • Using SearchValues in ContentDispositionHeaderValue #55039
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Make the key ring cache expire shortly after an immediately-activated key is generated #54517
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun
  • Update Wix version #55088
    area-infrastructure
  • Improve the style for developer exception page #55042
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Introduce a logger provider that counts warnings and errors #54846
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add HybridCache public API #55084
    feature-caching, area-runtime
